Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the taxi and limousine commission license fee for compressed natural gas and certain hybrid-electric vehicles.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Availability of a computerized service to facilitate notification requirements pursuant to the pesticide neighbor notification law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to accessible for-hire vehicles.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring all for-hire vehicle base stations to have at least one for-hire vehicle accessible to persons who use wheelchairs or other mobility aids.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to extending the retirement period for clean air and accessible taxicabs.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Replacement cycles for taxicabs.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating a plan to promote the use of clean air and accessible taxicabs and for-hire vehicles.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creating a plan to promote the use of clean air taxis and for-hire vehicles.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to clearly identifying clean air vehicles and providing information regarding such vehicles.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Clearly identifying clean air taxicabs and providing information regarding such vehicles.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to displaying wheelchair insignias on the exterior of accessible vehicles.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Displaying the international wheelchair insignia on the exterior of accessible taxicabs.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to accessible clean air taxis.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Relation to accessible clean air taxis.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating a Central Accessibility Dispatch System.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creating a Central Accessibility Dispatch System.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to special parking for accessible for-hire vehicles.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Special parking for accessible for-hire vehicles.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to extending the license term for base stations with hybrid-electric vehicles.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Extending the license term for base stations with hybrid-electric vehicles.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing the accessibility of taxicabs for people with disabilities.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Increasing the accessibility of taxicabs for people with disabilities.
